Scene:
Kikyo Field
(Kikyōgahara / 桔梗原)

Play: The Twenty-Four Dutiful Sons (本朝廿四孝)

Production: October 1969

– Click image to view.



Narrators (Tayu):

Toyotake Matsukadayū (豊竹松香大夫)

Takemoto Oritayū V (see also Takemoto Tsunatayū IX) (竹本織大夫 (五))



Shamisen Players:

Takezawa Danji (竹沢団治)

Tsuruzawa Tokutarō (see also Tsuruzawa Dōhachi II) (鶴沢徳太郎)
